pageProduct.name: Skin Republic Brightening Vitamin C Face Mask
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Facial sheet mask drenched in a brightening serum for a luminous, glowing complexion.

  • Reduces visible appearance of age spots and imperfections
  • Helps brighten and even skin tone
  • Antioxidant and moisture rich

Brightening radiance enhancing Vitamins C, E and 7 Plant Extracts help reduce the appearance of age spots and imperfections for a bright and even skin tone. Hydrates and revitalises the skin to reveal a radiant and luminous complexion.

Warnings

SUN ALERT: this product may increase skin’s sensitivity to the sun, be certain to apply a broad spectrum sunscreen of at least SPF 15 for a week after using mask.

Ingredients

Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycereth-26, Propylene Glycol, Rosa Centifolia Flower Water, Betaine, Bis-PEG-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Polyglutamic Acid, Carbomer, Triethanolamine, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Allantoin, Chondrus Crispus (Carrageenan), Methylparaben, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Disodium EDTA, Fragrance, Arbutin, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Coffea Arabica (Coffee) Seed Extract, Diospyros Kaki Leaf Extract, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Wine Extract, Propylparaben, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Ascorbic Acid ((25ppm)

Directions

Cleanse skin, remove mask from packaging, unfold and place on face, wear for 15-20 minutes, remove mask, do not rinse. Excess serum can be applied to neck, décolletage and hands.
